go_data.justification: Nck is part of a complex that links TCR signaling to the remodeling of the actin cytoskeleton.
Nck is involved in T cell signaling and the formation of a complex that brings together Ena/VASP family proteins and the Arp2/3 complex.
Nck is part of a complex composed of Fyb/SLAP, SLP-76, Nck, and WASP in T cells.
The SH3 domain of Nck binds to WASP.
Nck is involved in actin cytoskeleton organization and cell signaling, which occur in the cytoplasm.
